pages.text: It appears that Vagrants are capable of using Factories to produce smaller variants of the Bogle's explosive charges.$(br)Reducing the size, however, has rendered the charge inert, preventing it from detonating.

$(#630000)I can use this to add the Explosion brew effect to any Brew Sacs I create. The effect causes the sac to deal damage similarly to the Harm effect, additionally exploding violently on a direct hit.
